Section.Catchline: Public records exemptions; minors seeking waiver of notice requirements.

SectionBody.Text: Any information that can be used to identify a minor petitioning a circuit court for a judicial waiver, as provided in s. 390.01114, of the notice requirements under the Parental Notice of Abortion Act is:

Subsection.Text: Confidential and exempt from s. 24(a), Art. I of the State Constitution if held by a circuit court or an appellate court.

Paragraph.Text: Confidential and exempt from s. 119.07(1) and s. 24(a), Art. I of the State Constitution if held by the office of criminal conflict and civil regional counsel or the Justice Administrative Commission.

Paragraph (a) is subject to the Open Government Sunset Review Act in accordance with s. 119.15 and shall stand repealed on October 2, 2015, unless reviewed and saved from repeal through reenactment by the Legislature.
